AttackerCapabilities: Basic understanding of HTTP status codes

Steps.Description: The attacker opens the web page and notices that only the text 'I hope you like robots!' is displayed.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that there may be other paths or hidden content on the web page.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker tries opening the robots.txt file by appending it to the URL.
StepDetails.Result: The robots.txt file is successfully opened and displays the content.

Steps.Description: The attacker analyzes the content of the robots.txt file and notices a disallowed path: /g00d_old_mus1c.php.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that accessing the disallowed path may reveal something interesting.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker tries accessing the /g00d_old_mus1c.php path.
StepDetails.Result: The /g00d_old_mus1c.php page is successfully accessed and displays the flag.
